abstract: General Electric named South Korea’s LG Electronics as a contender to buy its appliance business, which is valued at between $4 billion and $8 billion, along with others, including China’s Haier Electronics Group, Mexico’s Mabe and Turkey’s Arcelik.
lead_paragraph: General Electric named South Korea’s LG Electronics as a contender to buy its appliance business, which is valued at between $4 billion and $8 billion, along with others, including China’s Haier Electronics Group, Mexico’s Mabe and Turkey’s Arcelik.

headline.main: G.E. Names Possible Suitors for Appliance Business
